data.title: Denver Nuggets Roster
data.meta_description: Denver Nuggets scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
2025 first round draft pick to Orlando

Denver's 1st round pick to Orlando protected for selections 1-5 in 2025, 1-5 in 2026 and 1-5 in 2027 (if Denver has not conveyed a 1st round pick to Orlando by 2027, then Denver's obligation to Orlando will be extinguished) [Denver-Orlando, 3/25/2021]

2027 first round draft pick to Oklahoma City

At least two years after Denver conveys a 1st round pick to Orlando or in 2029 if this pick is not conveyed to Orlando, Denver's 1st round pick to Oklahoma City protected for selections 1-5 in 2027, 1-5 in 2028 and 1-5 in 2029; if Denver has not conveyed this first potential 1st round pick to Oklahoma City by 2029, then Denver will instead convey its 2029 2nd round pick to Oklahoma City; Oklahoma City may convey the 2027 pick to the L.A. Clippers (see Oklahoma City Incoming) [Denver-Oklahoma City, 6/23/2022]

2027 second round draft pick to Cleveland

Denver's 2027 2nd round pick to Cleveland [Cleveland-Denver, 3/25/2021]

2028 second round draft pick to San Antonio

Denver's 2028 2nd round pick to San Antonio protected for selections 31-33 (if this pick falls within its protected range and is therefore not conveyed, then Denver's obligation to San Antonio will be extinguished) [Boston-Denver-San Antonio, 1/19/2022]

2029 first round draft pick to Oklahoma City

Only if and at least two years after Denver conveys a first potential 1st round pick to Oklahoma City, Denver's second potential 1st round pick to Oklahoma City protected for selections 1-5 in 2029 and 1-5 in 2030; if Denver has not conveyed this second potential 1st round pick to Oklahoma City by 2030, then Denver will instead convey its 2030 2nd round pick to Oklahoma City [Denver-Indiana-L.A. Lakers-Oklahoma City, 6/23/2023]

Christian Braun was selected as the #21 pick in the First Round of the 2022 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Christian Braun signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 3, 2022.

Vlatko Cancar was selected as the #19 pick in the Second Round of the 2017 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Vlatko Cancar signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on August 1, 2019. Vlatko Cancar re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 7, 2022. Vlatko Cancar re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 6, 2024.

Nikola Jokic was selected as the #11 pick in the Second Round of the 2014 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Nikola Jokic signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 12, 2015. Nikola Jokic re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 9, 2018. Nikola Jokic signed a multi-year extension with the Denver Nuggets on July 8, 2022.

Jamal Murray was selected as the #7 pick in the First Round of the 2016 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Jamal Murray signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 19, 2016. Jamal Murray signed a multi-year extension with the Denver Nuggets on July 24, 2019.

Zeke Nnaji was selected as the #22 pick in the First Round of the 2020 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Zeke Nnaji signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on November 30, 2020. Zeke Nnaji signed a multi-year extension with the Denver Nuggets on October 23, 2023.

Michael Porter, Jr. was selected as the #14 pick in the First Round of the 2018 NBA Draft by the Denver Nuggets. Michael Porter, Jr. signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 3, 2018. Michael Porter, Jr. signed a multi-year extension with the Denver Nuggets on September 29, 2021.

Draft Rights to DaRon Holmes II, the #22 pick in the First Round of the 2024 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Phoenix Suns on June 26, 2024. DaRon Holmes II signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 9, 2024.

Draft Rights to Jalen Pickett, the #2 pick in the Second Round of the 2023 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Indiana Pacers on June 23, 2023. Jalen Pickett signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 6, 2023.

Draft Rights to Julian Strawther, the #29 pick in the First Round of the 2023 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Indiana Pacers on June 23, 2023. Julian Strawther signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 6, 2023.

Draft Rights to Hunter Tyson, the #7 pick in the Second Round of the 2023 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Oklahoma City Thunder on June 23, 2023. Hunter Tyson signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 6, 2023.

Draft Rights to Peyton Watson, the #30 pick in the First Round of the 2022 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Oklahoma City Thunder on June 23, 2022. Peyton Watson signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 3, 2022.
